textBox.richText: Idiap is organizing 3 new competitions in conjunction with The 6th IAPR/IEEE International Conference on Biometrics (http://atvs.ii.uam.es/icb2013/) June 4-7, 2013 Madrid SPAIN. The 2nd competition on counter measures to 2D facial spoofing attacks: Following the first competition on counter measures to 2D spoofing attacks consisting of printed photographs, Idiap organizes a second competition for comparison of the performance of spoofing counter measures, this time on a more diverse set of spoofing attacks. More information at: http://www.tabularasa-euproject.org/evaluations/icb-2013-face-anti-spoofing The 2nd competition on face recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database: More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-face-recognition-mobio The 1st competition on speaker recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-speaker-recognition-mobio
